function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased risk of contagious disease propagation in urban environments","Impact":"Spread of disease leading to illness and fatalities","Mitigation":"Implementing strict sanitation measures, social distancing, and contact tracing","Technologies":"Smart sensors for monitoring population density, air quality, and contact tracing apps","People":"Urban residents, commuters, and visitors","Owner":"Government, city planners, public health authorities"}]}
